actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to increase the penalties for persons convicted of illegally distributing narcotic and other dangerous drugs.

summary.text: Imposes a minimum and increases the maximum sentence for distribution of narcotic drugs and hallucinogens other than marijuana, peyote, and mescaline. Prohibits the granting of a probationary or suspended sentence with respect to such a crime. Eliminates the additional sentence for distribution of such a substance to a person under 21 years old.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to increase the penalties for persons convicted of illegally distributing narcotic and other dangerous drugs.
